definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Eat fat food less, no-noSmokeWine, answer to often maintain defecate unobstructed .
sentences.chinese: 少吃油腻食物，禁忌烟酒，并应经常保持大便通畅。

sentences.english: Modify your diet to exclude or limit dairy products, alcohol, smoking or other stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 不吃或少吃乳制品，尽量不要接近烟酒或其他刺激物。

sentences.english: Women hate men who can't live without booze, sex and cigars.
sentences.chinese: 女人厌恶离不开烟酒和性的男人。

sentences.english: Don't fight not gentleness don't eosinophilic alcohol and tobacco, single good woman alone.
sentences.chinese: 不倾城不温柔不嗜烟酒，单身只身好女人。

sentences.english: Don't eat too much salt, and avoid alcohol and cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 不要吃得太咸，同时要免除烟酒。

sentences.english: The combination of smoking and alcohol consumption causes most laryngeal cancer cases.
sentences.chinese: 烟酒不误导致了大多数喉癌病例。

sentences.english: Design a bulletin board with "We are a smoke-free and alcohol-free generation" as the theme.
sentences.chinese: 以“我们是远离烟酒的一代”为题，设计一块公告板。

sentences.english: Do you drink alcohol, smoke, or abstain?
sentences.chinese: 你喝酒抽烟吗，还是烟酒不沾？

sentences.english: No tobacco, no gambling and no any bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 无烟酒赌等任何不良嗜好。

sentences.english: Tobacco and alcoholic drinks are taxed heavily in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，对烟酒的抽税极重。

sentences.english: Could you tell me the duty-free limit on alcohol and tobacco?
sentences.chinese: 麻烦你告诉我烟酒的免税规定好吗？

sentences.english: Some students develop substance addictions, leading them toward depression.
sentences.chinese: 一些大学生还沉迷烟酒，却反而引起抑郁。

sentences.english: He has suggested imposing an oil import fee and raising excise taxes on liquor and cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 他建议增加石油进口税与提高烟酒货物税。

definition: to give up drinking/to abstain from drinking
heavy drinking/to get drunk/to drink to excess
alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
